CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK( Valid_From__c),ISBLANK( Valid_To__c)), TRUE, IF(AND(ISBLANK( Valid_From__c), NOW() <= Valid_To__c ), TRUE, IF(AND(ISBLANK( Valid_To__c), NOW() >= Valid_From__c ), TRUE, IF(AND(NOW() >= Valid_From__c, NOW() <= Valid_To__c ), TRUE, FALSE))))
CustomField.label: Active
